content.newsInsight: BBC reports Trump's threatening legal action against them over an edited interview. Everyone's debating press freedom. We're watching something else. When a president-elect picks media fights before taking office, he's not protecting his image. He's testing institutional resistance.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: Trump versus BBC, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: which institutions will bend first when pressed, and what does their response sequence reveal about power's new geography?
